entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 3:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3 except temperature steady near minus 1 along the Strait.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3 except temperature steady near minus 1 along the Strait. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
